sections.workQualitySubtitle: Ability to carry out tasks under their responsibility by imposing personal quality standards
sections.interpersonalSkillsSubtitle: Ability to establish harmonious relationships in the workplace
sections.personalSkillsSubtitle: Ability to demonstrate mature and responsible attitudes or behaviors

productivity.planOrganize: Plan and organize their work effectively

workQuality.respectMandates: Respect the mandates assigned to them
workQuality.attentionToDetail: Pay attention to details when performing their tasks
workQuality.verifyWork: Verify their work, ensure nothing has been forgotten
workQuality.analyzeProblems: Provide good analysis of problems encountered

interpersonal.adaptCulture: Easily adapt to the company culture
interpersonal.activeListening: Demonstrate active listening by trying to understand others' point of view

personalSkills.interestMotivation: Demonstrate interest and motivation at work
personalSkills.senseResponsibility: Demonstrate good sense of responsibility requiring minimal supervision
personalSkills.punctualDiligent: Be punctual and diligent at work
